channel.title: Culture Doom
channel.itunes:author: Culture Doom
channel.description:
An audio-only version of the YouTube podcast Culture Doom.
"Culture Doom is a wickedly entertaining podcast hosted by two savvy and sassy middle-aged men who know how to have a good time while tackling the latest buzz-worthy topics in culture, media, and current events. Join the dynamic duo as they dish out their irreverent, hilarious takes on everything from the latest Netflix shows to the hottest TikTok trends. With their fresh perspective and razor-sharp wit, these guys make even the most mundane news stories seem exciting and relevant. So if you want to stay in the know"

item.title: The Long and the Short of Your Summer Balls—Men's Health
